short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unified web safety, banking security, malware protection, and AI-powered phishing defense by Kavach Intelligence

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your online safety with Kavach IntelliGuard. Leveraging AI technology, it identifies phishing attempts, stops harmful malware, and ensures secure banking activities. Real-time analysis protects against evolving threats while preserving your privacy. Lightweight, fast, and designed for seamless browsing security.
